name: Dupes
description:
Dupes is a local multiplayer game for Android devices, developed in 48 hours during the BeMyApp hackathon in February 2013.

From 2 to 4 players, each player chooses one colour. Your task is to repeat the 3-step sequence given by the computer. The player who completes 10 sequences first is the winner.

Ideal to play with your friends at a party.


Tumblr - Twitter
